# Felix Oyeleke's Personal Website

This is a personal portfolio website inspired by oliur.com's clean, minimal design aesthetic.

## Design Principles
- Clean, minimal design with plenty of white space
- Typography-focused layout with clear hierarchy
- Simple color palette (primarily black/white with blue accents)
- Responsive design that works on all devices
- Fast loading and accessible

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS v4 for styling
- Deployed on Vercel

## Content Structure
- Hero section with profile image and introduction
- Projects/Creating section highlighting work
- Newsletter signup
- Blog posts
- Social links
- About page

## Styling Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML elements
- Prefer Tailwind utility classes
- Maintain consistent spacing and typography
- Ensure proper contrast ratios
- Use hover states for interactive elements

## Development Notes
- Components should be functional and well-typed
- Keep bundle size minimal
- Optimize images and fonts
- Follow Next.js best practices
- Test responsive design on different screen sizes
